Hi, I'm Chaitanya Tilak

Data Scientist | Business Analytics

Data Scientist skilled in Python, SQL, and cloud platforms (Azure, GCP, Databricks) with experience building analytical models, designing scalable data pipelines, and transforming complex datasets into actionable business insights. Strong foundation in feature engineering, experimentation, and ML model development, with the ability to communicate technical findings into clear, business-focused recommendations.

About Me

My Introduction

Data Scientist with a foundation in Business Analytics and Data Science & AI, focused on high-impact analytical solutions across machine learning, cloud data engineering, and business intelligence. Expertise spans Python, SQL, Azure, Google Cloud, and modern ML workflows for handling large-scale structured, unstructured, and time-series datasets. Work includes smart-meter anomaly detection for MidAmerican Energy using deep learning and statistical techniques; an NLP-driven ESG risk analytics framework leveraging transformer models, topic modeling, and sentiment scoring; and a comprehensive restaurant market expansion analysis built on Azure’s big-data ecosystem. Strong capabilities in feature engineering, cloud-native data pipelines, scalable ETL, model evaluation, and visualization, enabling transparent insights and reliable decision support across diverse business environments.

What I did here

  • Transformed raw educational content into structured, analytics-ready datasets by standardizing 500+ data points into consistent HTML and SQL formats, improving data quality and reducing downstream processing effort for automation.

  • Designed taxonomy-driven labeling workflows and created high-quality structured datasets for NLP, question-tagging, and content-classification models, enhancing dataset usability for future machine learning applications.

  • Validated data rendering across the web interface by coordinating frontend integration, performing QA checks, and resolving formatting inconsistencies to ensure accuracy, usability, and alignment with content delivery pipelines.

Portfolio

My Projects

Anomaly Detection in Digital Meters

MidAmerican Energy – Master’s Capstone Project

  • Built an end-to-end anomaly detection pipeline for a year of smart-meter data, engineering extensive temporal and weather-driven features to uncover strong relationships between extreme weather and abnormal energy usage.

  • Benchmarked ML and statistical methods—Autoencoder, Isolation Forest, One-Class SVM, LOF, Robust Covariance, STL decomposition, Z-Score, IQR—and selected a hybrid approach where the Autoencoder achieved the strongest precision–recall performance.

  • Identified anomaly spikes during peak-load and severe weather events, enabling proactive maintenance planning and improving billing accuracy for MidAmerican Energy.

    • Tech Stack

    Python, Pandas, NumPy, Scikit-learn, Autoencoders, Time-Series Features

    View Code View Report View Presentation

    Restaurant Market Expansion Analytics

    Big-Data Pipeline on Azure

  • Developed a big-data pipeline using Azure Data Factory, Azure SQL, and Tableau to process and analyze 840K+ TripAdvisor restaurant records across major European cities.

  • Performed geospatial and pricing analytics to identify underserved cuisines and saturated markets, supporting data-driven market-entry decisions for U.S. restaurant brands.

  • Created profitability and break-even models that informed optimal pricing tiers, location selection, and market expansion strategies.

    • Tech Stack

    Azure Data Factory, Azure SQL, Tableau, Python, Geospatial Analytics

    View Report View Presentation

    ESG Risk Analytics Dashboard

    NLP-driven ESG Risk Index

  • Built an NLP-based ESG risk analysis pipeline using GCP Vertex AI to extract signals from SEC 10-K filings and global news through preprocessing, topic tagging, and transformer-based sentiment scoring.

  • Engineered ESG classification features using taxonomies, entity extraction, and FinBERT/VADER sentiment, creating a transparent ESG Risk Index for monthly company-level tracking.

  • Designed interactive Power BI dashboards to visualize ESG trends, sentiment patterns, and risk scores with drill-down capabilities for deeper analysis.

    • Tech Stack

    GCP Vertex AI, Python, FinBERT, VADER, Power BI, NLP Pipelines
